content: Certificate with same action type already exists

comment.text: "This translation key is used to display an error message when a certificate with the same action type already exists. It appears in forms or UI elements that allow users to create or edit certificates, such as the SSO form store."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'شهادة بنفس نوع الإجراء موجودة بالفعل.' while understandable, is a slightly literal and less natural-sounding translation of "Certificate with same action type already exists." A more idiomatic Arabic phrasing would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: شهادة أخرى بنفس نوع الإجراء موجودة بالفعل. (Shahadat ukhra binafs naw' al-ijra' mawjuda bilfil). - This translates to 'Another certificate with the same action type already exists.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Υπάρχει ήδη πιστοποιητικό με τον ίδιο τύπο ενέργειας" is a literal translation, but could be improved for clarity and naturalness in Greek. The phrase "τύπος ενέργειας" (type of energy) might not be the most suitable phrasing in this context. A certificate typically represents an action or purpose, not an energy type.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more contextually accurate translation like: "Υπάρχει ήδη πιστοποιητικό με τον ίδιο σκοπό" (There is already a certificate with the same purpose) or "Υπάρχει ήδη πιστοποιητικό με την ίδια λειτουργία" (There is already a certificate with the same function).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is technically correct but could be more natural and user-friendly. 'ປະເພດການປະຕິບັດ' (type of execution) is a bit technical. A simpler phrasing would improve clarity for the user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃບຢັ້ງຢືນທີ່ມີຄືນແບບດຽວກັນມີຢູ່ແລ້ວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Já existe um certificado com o mesmo tipo de acção" is a literal translation and could be improved for naturalness in Portuguese. A more idiomatic phrasing would be 'Um certificado com o mesmo tipo de ação já existe' or 'Já existe um certificado com o mesmo tipo de ação'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Um certificado com o mesmo tipo de ação já existe

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Es gibt bereits ein Zertifikat mit gleichem Aktionstyp' is in German, not Romanian. It translates to 'There is already a certificate with the same action type'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The correct Romanian translation should be something like: 'Există deja un certificat cu același tip de acțiune' or 'Un certificat cu același tip de acțiune există deja'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'සමාන ක්‍රියාමාර්ග වර්ගයක සහතිකයක් දැනටමත් පවතී' is a literal translation but may not be the most natural or clear way to express the intended meaning in Sinhala. A more user-friendly translation would better convey the message.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation might be something like 'මේ ක්‍රියාකාරීත්වයකට සමාන සහතිකයක් දැනටමත් තිබේ' or 'මේ ආකාරයේ ක්‍රියාවකට සමාන සහතිකයක් දැනටමත් පවතී'. The best option depends on the specific context of the application.
